MUDI, mkpọbiri aha bụ Mudiaga, bụ ụdị ụlọ ọrụ gbasara ejiji Naijiria nke Clement Mudiaga Enajemo hiwere. Enajemo malitere azụmahịa ya n'afọ 1993 ma bụrụ onye mbụ na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria weere ngwaahịa ya gaa mba ọzọ site na imeghe ụlọ ahịa na mba ndị ọzọ.

MUDI Africa bụ ụlọ ọrụ ejiji mba ụwa Afrocentric nke onye nnọchi anya ya bụ Mozez Praiz.Ndia akpọpụtara aha  eyituola uwe omepụtara di ka  John Kufuor (onye bụbu onye isi ala Ghana) , Salif Keita, Youssou N’Dour, John Obi Mikel, Kolo Toure, John Fashanu, Richard Mofe-Damijo, Fred Amata, Basorge Tariah Jr., Frank Edoho, Ramsey Nouah, Desmond Elliot, Olu Jacobs, Jumobi Adegbesan (nke bụ Mofe–Damijo ugbu a), Shiek Karamotor, Kwasi Kyei Darwkah, Yves Zogbo, na Eze Mohammed V nke Morocco.
N'afọ 2018, MUDI Africa kpọrọ Nhiwe ya aha onye mba Ghana nwụrụ anwụ na onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN bụ Kofi Annan
